name: The Adventures of Sam Carlisle: The Hunt for the L
summary:
The Adventures of Sam Carlisle: The Hunt for the Lost Treasure is a 2D Puzzle Platformer that will take you on an adventure of a lifetime. 
Meet Sam Carlisle. He has a normal life, a life that he really enjoys. He is working on a secret project. A project that will make him millions. A lost treasure. 
But this treasure was stolen from him. Help Sam to get it back through beautifully crafted worlds. The environment and other entities are your enemies. 
Sam doesn't have any powers or weapons. With Sam not having any powers, abilities or even weapons he can only move up, down, left and right. The world is Sam's enemy. But the gameplay will make the Player better and not Sam. Ther are 10 different game mechanics to help or make Sam's life a bit more difficult. The game is designed for Left and right-handed people with great XBox controller support
